title: Creating Ranked Team - Recruiting
body:
Looking for 3 Golds & High Silvers.

Aiming for 15+ wins to  obtain end of season rewards etc.

Form;

Role:
IGN:
Rank:

replies.body:
Form; Top Lane main, that has good team communication, decisions. Tend to main carry top laners. Was once a shotcaller for a Gold 2 team back in season 5.

Role: Top. Secondary: Mid
IGN: Pr0Ki1l3r (I'm planning to change it once I purchase some extra RP :P)
Rank: Gold V, oce, in current season and Gold 5, back in NA last season -  http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Pr0Ki1l3r & http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Pr0Ki1l3r  p.s. I have a bad k.d because of reasons (*cough* tilt *cough*). Don't die 10 times a game 90% of the time lel.

Form; AD Main, Great with teamworking skills, will always have a laugh! not much experience with ranked 5s but spent over 3000 hours playing! :)

Role: ADC
IGN: G U CK F 0 S U
Rank: Gold 1

Mind if I join? I want the 10 wins reward. 

I main middle lane.

IGN: Krylo

Role: ad, jungle and top
IGN: RNG Worlds S6
Rank: Gold 1

Form; ADC main who focuses on objectives and close down a game fast and quick. Always positive. Has decent experience with all adc champs but tend to stick to the meta picks (Jhin and Lucian). Gold 4 last season, silver 2 right now. 

Role: adc
IGN: Muffinman
Rank: S2. Peak rank: G4
